hook_text: Did you know that the missing Flight 19 reappears intact, year after year?
script_text: Did you know that the missing Flight 19 reappears intact, year after year? On December 5th, 1945, five TBM Avenger torpedo bombers vanished over the Bermuda Triangle, never to be seen until, strange appearances began to occur. Decades later, reports emerged of an intact Flight 19 suddenly appearing in remote airstrips across the globe—briefly, eerily intact. Each year, various locations from Argentina to Alaska report unconfirmed sightings of these aircraft gliding through ghostly fogs—heralding calamity. Authorities find nothing, leaving only chilled witnesses. The pattern continues, leaving investigators puzzled as the planes vanish just as they appeared, leaving behind only questions.

A fog rolls in, and a distant engine sound hints at the impossible.
